0: There is still time to rock and revel in celebration of America's greatest rock band, the Grateful Dead. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR MLBAM is giving fans an exclusive offer to purchase all five nights of "Fare Thee Well" on-demand for $49.95. Single night replays are also avaiable for $17.95. Rebroadcasts of "Fare Thee Well" on MLBAM are available for a limited time only, through August 7. If you've already purchased the MLBAM webcast, you can re-watch anytime, on-demand through August 7.
